You can also use keywords to refine your search. Examples:
  • #mun québec (to search for a municipality)
  • #sante Lévis (to search for a health establishment)
  • #cpe Joyeux (to search for a center Early Childhood)
*Keywords appear in the Search Options menu when hovering over a Result Type.
